name: Hawthorn Suites by Wyndham Los Angeles

reviews.text: My stay was excellent. My only recommendation would be lighter wall color since there are no windows in the back of the rooms. The food and maid service was wonderful.
reviews.title: My stay was excellent. My only recommendation would be...

reviews.text: Stayed one night in March, 2013. Everything was great. Upon check-in, we were offered cookies and bottled water. A very nice touch and much appreciated. The staff was friendly and helpful.
reviews.title: CLEAN, COURTEOUS STAFF, COMFORTABLE BEDS

reviews.text: The half terrible location is based on its location on the street. First, Google misidentifies its location on the East side. It is actually on the West side of the street. Second, it is so easy to miss, it is not easy. I probably circled twice around until I found it. Third, all the lights at the cross-sections are terribly long, so if you come down the wrong street, you will be waiting forever to get back into the right. Fourth, traffic on this road is quite heavy, so getting out of the garage (which is a hazard in and of itself because it is so easy to miss that there is an exit and there is no warning that there might be exiting traffic) is quite difficult.
reviews.title: Half terrible / half good location, decent stay

reviews.text: I stayed here in march and had a few problems with a handicapped accessible room. I had to return to the area a couple of weeks later and reluctantly booked this hotel again based on location. Much to my delight the manager had received my complaints and fixed the problems with the room, making it very comfortable for me to stay here. With a perfect location and attentive staff I will definitely stay here any time I am in the LA/ Manhattan Beach area.
reviews.title: Great customer service!!

reviews.text: Pros:Rooms were clean and spacious; Overall property was clean and tidy; staff were polite and helpful. We received fresh cookies and water when we checked in.
reviews.title: Pros:Rooms were clean and spacious; Overall property was...

reviews.text: Cons: Breakfast and social hour food was mediocre; half-wall in room prevented A/C from circulating and made the room a little stuffy.
reviews.title: Nice Low Budget Hotel

reviews.text: Great location near LAX and not far from the ocean. Reasonable (for the area) rates. Room is awkward with A/C unit in front room rather than bedroom, tiny desk and angled lav. I stayed overnight for a very early flight so didn't try breakfast. I'd stay again due to proximity to LAX and price.
reviews.title: It could be so much better

reviews.text: We had a great stay here. The staff was very friendly & took care of everything we asked for! It was very clean & comfortable! I definitely would ray there again!
reviews.title: We had a great stay here. The staff was very friendly ...

aka: Hawthorn Suites By Wyndham Los Angeles Hotel Manhattan Beach
description: We invite you to enjoy a fresh, new hotel experience were our motto is Live Well, Sleep Easy. Situated in the heart of fashionable Manhattan Beach, our contemporary studio and one-bedroom suites offer the cozy ambiance of residential living in Southern California's relaxing beach culture. NOW WITH EVEN FASTER DOWNLOAD AND UPLOAD SPEED. EXPERIENCE THE DIFFERENCE.
